title: ➤RARE 3 Bed/3 Bath in Somerville! W/D In-Unit! Avail. 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 206550315', 'Rent: $4,200 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 3', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Truly amazing 3 bed/3 bath in Somerville is available for a 9/1 move in!', 'Located in a quiet neighborhood, with easy access to I-93!', 'Davis Square and Porter Square are both minutes away!', 'This top-floor unit features:', '-Hardwood floors', '-Updated kitchen', '-Granite counters', '-Stainless steel appliances', '-Dishwasher', '-Sunny & spacious rooms', '-Renovated bathrooms', '-Laundry in unit', '-Central air HVAC', 'Water included!', 'Off-street parking included as well!', 'Video tour available as well.', "Reach out now for a showing, this unit won't last in today's crazy market!", 'Please email Terry to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 88 235 Highland Ave (0.37 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Medford St @ Trull St (0.12 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Main St @ Dexter St (0.30 mi)', 'Bus: 89 Broadway @', 'Medford St - Magoun Sq (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 89/93 Broadway @', 'Medford St - Magoun Sq (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 95 Mystic Ave opp Fulbright St (0.60 mi)', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
